tags.name: Reserved
tags.tooltip: This bit must alway be zero due to Rockwells way of handling double int's

tags.name: masked
tags.tooltip: Item Feedback Masked, Note; inhibits item fault, however this doesn't mean the ACTUAL item state feedback is ignored.

tags.name: manual
tags.tooltip: Item in Manual, i.e NOT in Auto

tags.name: locate
tags.tooltip: Item location functions activated when true
